description: Catering services for 41 Canadian Brigade Group in Alberta.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** \*\*W3666-24N023 Catering Services\*\*
**Title (French):** \*\*W3666-24N023 Services de traiteur\*\*

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4461625376-Doc4540702300

**Publication Date:** May 28, 2024
**Closing Date for Bids:** June 20, 2024, 14:00:00

**Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2024
**Contract End Date:** To be determined

## Notice Type and Method

*   This public works tender is a **Request for Standing Offer**.
*   The procurement method is **Competitive - Open bidding**.

## Contract Requirements

The Department of National Defence (DND) and the 41 Canadian Brigade Group (41 CBG) in Alberta require catering services on an as-and-when-requested basis.

## Trade Agreements and Certifications

This public works tender is open to contractors who are certified under the following international agreements:

*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Delivery

Contractors must be prepared to deliver catering services to the 41 Canadian Brigade Group in Calgary, Alberta.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). Contractors may contact Lyland Wiebe, the public works specialist (SPAC/PSPC), through email ([lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)) for any queries or concerns related to this tender.

## Tender Documentation and Procurement Process

Please refer to the notice URL at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/198
